bug.author: bacook17
bug.summary: DataManager does not work with Pandas Dataframe
bug.description: When a DataManager is loaded with a Pandas DataFrame, calls to the "feature_info" property raise a ValueError. It comes from generate_column_sample creating individual DataManagers for each column, which are Pandas Series, not DataFrames. I am adding a pull-request which updates test_data.py to include a failing test, and will work on a correction.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/oracle/Skater/pull/242>#242</denchmark-link> has been addressed and merged. Thanks again for the help <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bacook17>@bacook17</denchmark-link>
